lines: Mumw’ achapinda nezambara, Gare, gare, gare, gare
Kune mbiri yandamirira, Ndiwe here, Ndini here?
Todya rufaro rwataurwa, Ndiwe here? Ndini here?
Mumw’ achatura muchinjiko, Gare, gare, gare, gare
Vamwe vachapiwa ndarama, Ndiwe here? Ndini here?
Ozofara naye narini, Ndiwe here? Ndini here?
Mumw’ achapfigirwa musiwo, Gare, gare, gare, gare
Inzvi roti handikuzivi, Ndiwe here? Ndini here?
Mumwe achadana, haanzvikwi, Otambura m’siwo wapfigwa
Mumwe oshaya mubairo, Ndiwe here? Ndini here?
Mumw’ anoimba rukuriro, Gare, gare, gare, gare
Tomukudza nevaponeswa, Ndiwe here? Ndini here?
Tozova mumbiri narini, Ndiwe here? Ndini here?
